itemDescription: philosopher and fellow of the University of Oxford

wikipedia_page.main: John Simopoulos (12 June 1923 – 4 March 2015) was a philosopher and fellow of St. Catherine's College, Oxford.Simopoulos was born in Vienna, the son of Greek diplomat Charalambos Simopoulos, who was serving there. His father was also at one time ambassador to the Court of St James's in London.

response: *John Simopoulos, 91, British philosopher.John Simopoulos, Oxford don - obituary
Charalambos John Simopoulos (; 1874-1942)National Portrait Gallery, London, was a Greek diplomat who was ambassador to the Court of St. James in London at the beginning of the Second World War.
His son was the Oxford University academic John Simopoulos.https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/obituaries/11499576/John-Simopoulos-Oxford-don-obituary.html
